description.displayText:
We worked with Paula multiple times. She was SO good. 

I still chuckle when thinking about her playing with our son - who was between 15 months to 2 1/2 years-ish during the times she sat for us. Paula was so kind and engaging. She played puppets with the most amazing voices. She was kind, patient and compassionate. Paula was always on time and we trusted her fully.

Our only regret is that we couldn't hire her full time! She was already working with a family, so we were able to hire her to watch our son intermittently, but we would've hired her as our regular nanny in a heartbeat.

description.displayText: Paula was awesome in all ways. She was  always early and worked with my kids seamlessly after our last nanny left.  We appreciated the fact that she was a mature woman who cared for our children and jumped in with 2 feet.  She was responsible for getting them to their appointments and she cooked delicious meals and fit right in.  I would highly recommend her!!!
